Datatable.LocalizationPair: Factory golems that specialize in establishing new factory cities.
Factory golems that specialize in mining resources and delivering them to the Architect's factory city.
Factory engineers that specialize in repairs and overclocking golems.
The Factory engineers' 'instant soldier' solution; a low production cost, low quality, mass produced army.
The culmination of decades of research from the factory's lead developers resulted in the Vitruvian, the ultimate in front-line golem combat units.
The Architects realized that the factory's defences required solutions to problems before they arrived at the city's walls.
Your custom faction will display the 2D and 3D visuals of the Architects.
Standard security golems that can be used as Factory defense forces should the Factory ever come under attack.

The Architects: Peerless crafters, designers, and machinators. Their work is the pinnacle of automation, and now their great Factory City rises up from the ground, its production lines slowly waking; ready to show Auriga their genius and all its splendor.

The Factory's engineers are now one step closer to developing a new golem automaton model. We'll need to begin construction of a new wing for the Factory in order to support the unit's fabrication, but once we do we can begin full production.
Constructing new golem units is only possible with the proper Factory structures. Research 'Factory Logistics I' and a new unit type, then build the special district to allow unit manufacturing.
Construction on the new workshop has completed and the Factory is ready to begin production on the new golem model at any time.
Research 'Factory Logistics I' and a golem model for construction. Expand the Factory with the special District, then build the new unit.
A golem developed by one of the Factory's lost elite researchers. Designated 'Craft Alpha', this unit's capabilities are unknown.

To be able to manufacture more sophisticated golems Architect engineers have created a complex system for resource creation, storage, and allocation. As a happy side effect more specific modifications to existing models of golem will be possible as well.
By advancing concepts in storage, inner-Factory resource transportation, and developing new technology for golem modifications, more complex golem models become possible.
In order to begin construction of the new Vitruvian golem model we must outfit a section of the Factory City with special tools, resource processing, and part storage.
In order to begin construction of the new mass-produced models of golem soldiers we must outfit a section of the Factory City with special tools, resource processing, and part storage.
In order to begin construction of the new Collector golem model we must outfit a section of the Factory City with special tools, resource processing, and part storage.
In order to begin construction of the new Artillery golem model we must outfit a section of the Factory City with special tools, resource processing, and part storage.
Begin production on a new wing of the Factory City, adding new factories, warehouses, product lines, and more.
Golem units require a special one-time Factory City expansion in order to be constructed.
